Even though realistic team-based shooters aren't really my cup of tea, I still have managed to get impressive numbers on this game.

I have been playing the game from 2001 ( 20 years ) the game has not lost its grip at all. I have plated cs1.5, cs 1.6, cs go, The evolution of this game is always keeping the game up to date. This is a high intensity game with team play which i like the most.
One of the best classic games.

i think the game is a  one of a kind unmatchable. i played this when it was all servers and wow how it has grown over the  years. not as good as i once was but i haven't played in ten years. now in my forty's and been playing a month or so still is fun .

If you ever get past the aim botting users and toxic community you might have some fun. Other than that you have some people who decide its fun to hack and fun to use aim bot and you can clearly see this in your kill cam. On top of all that you have a development team that doesn't respond to inquiry, doesn't fix this toxic community and makes you feel like you just need to get better at the game. I refuse to play, purchase in the future, or continue to support this type of game with this type of community. Go play Squad or Arma if you want a REAL FPS shooter experience.
